item.description:
For those who want to continue their experience singing in a choir or playing in an orchestra, check this out and come for the Open House:

Dear Parents, Principals, Directors, Teachers, Counselors and all,

Focal Chinese Music and Asian|Boston Media Group just announced the establishment of the Boston International Asian Choir and Orchestra (BIACO). This is the combination of a choir and orchestra featuring Asian singers and musicians from Boston and the surrounding areas.

BIACO is a unique platform for members to explore Asian-inspired traditional and contemporary works through dynamic rehearsals and performances.

Children (minimum age is 7 years old), students, and adults are cordially invited to our free Open House on Sept 17 to get information and audition for this new musical organization. We are accepting members of any vocal or instrumental level (beginners are most welcome), and will provide training based on each student's capability.

The classes for all participants will be very affordable, especially for parents who want to enroll their children in this worthwhile venture. We are anticipating only $5 per session, with a maximum of four classes per month. The future will bring performances, competitions, and, if feasible, national and international tours. Attached is the flyer for the Open House.

Please share the news about BIACO and the upcoming Open House and Audition with anyone interested in joining.

Boston International Asian Choir and Orchestra

Open House and Audition

Saturday September 17, 2011

11am: Meet and Greet

Noon - 2pm: Audition - please prepare 2 instrumental or vocal works if available.

90 Tyler Street, Boston, MA 02111

Please feel free to call with any questions. Chinese (Mandarin, Cantonese, Toisanese), Vietnamese and Cambodian speakers available. Phone: 617.275.4249 or email: info@focalchinesemusic.com

Thank you for supporting the Boston International Asian Choir and Orchestra! We look forward to building a vibrant cultural scene within Boston's Asian community.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Open House + Audition: Boston International Asian Choir and Orchestra
